required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Analyse the Immediate Effect of Dry Needling and Extra Corporeal Shock Wave Therapy on Hand Grip Strength
clinical_study.official_title: The Immediate Effects of Dry Needling and Extra Corporeal Shockwave Therapy on Hand Grip Strength.A Randomised Controlled Trail.

lead_sponsor.agency: Comprehensive Rehabilitation Centre, Medina, Saudi Arabia

clinical_study.source: Comprehensive Rehabilitation Centre, Medina, Saudi Arabia

brief_summary.textblock: An argument to analyse the Immediate effect of dry needling or extra corporeal shock wave therapy on hand grip strength in normal healthy individuals with a hypothesis of dry needling or shock wave on forearm muscles have influence on the hand grip strength.

detailed_description.textblock: After written consent obtained from all the participants randomization and allocation will be done with sealed non transparent envelopes and participants will be assign to two groups Dry needling(DN) and Extra corporeal shock wave therapy (ESWT).Pre and post data of hand grip strength measured with Jamar hand dynamometer.Post data shall be collected precisely after 1 hr of intervention from both groups.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Participants will be assigned to two groups in parallel for the duration of the study.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Post 1 hours of Intervention in both groups
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of Hand Grip Strength with Jamar Dynamometer

arm_group.description: Dry needling for 5 mins on the flexor group of muscles of dominant forearm.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Extra corporeal Shockwave therapy Group or (ESWT)
arm_group.description: Delivering of Shock wave pulses of 1250 at the energy intensity of 0.58 mj/mm2 on the flexor group of muscles of dominant forearm

intervention.intervention_name: Dry needling and Extra corporeal Shock wave therapy
intervention.description: 5 mins of dry needling and 1250 pulses of shockwave therapy on dominant forearm muscles
intervention.arm_group_label: Extra corporeal Shockwave therapy Group or (ESWT)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- No pain on the visual analog scoring scale of 100 mm scale,
- Muscle power of 4+ on oxford manual muscle testing of forearm and wrist extrinsic and intrinsic muscles
- Full range of motion in all dominant upper extremity joints.
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of previous fractures of the dominant upper extremity,
- Teno-synovitis of flexor tendons ,
- Dequervains synovitis,
- Left hand dominance.

overall_official.affiliation: Comprehensive rehabilitation centre, Medina Al Munawwarah, Saudi Arabia.
Taibah University of Medical Rehabilitation Sciences
Taibah University of Medical Rehabilitation Sciences

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Comprehensive Rehabilitation Centre, Medina, Saudi Arabia
responsible_party.investigator_title: Head of the Department of Physical therapy and Rehabilitation.

patient_data.ipd_description: Results of Hand grip strength pre and post intervention.
